<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sculpt Shadows](/Feats.aspx?ID=2511) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You coax nearby shadows into the shape of a simple weapon or a simple tool or item, using a tiny piece of your shadow to make it solid; in doing so, you lose 1 Hit Point. You can create only level-0 common, non-consumable [weapons](/equipment/weapons), or [adventuring gear](/equipment/adventuring-gear) with no intricate parts, written text, or other complicated components. The item lasts until used for a single activity, until you Sculpt Shadows again, or for 1 minute, whichever comes first. Once the duration expires, the object dissipates, and you regain the lost Hit Point unless the item was [Broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) or Destroyed. As the object holds a tiny sliver of your shadow, you can't recover the lost Hit Point until after the object dissipates.
name: Sculpt Shadows
